name: Zoom Capabilities
description: Evaluation dataset for Zoom subagent capabilities including meeting management, webinars, recordings, and participant tracking. Includes lazy queries, intentional mistakes, and ambiguous items.

items.input: create a zoom meeting for tomorrow at 2pm
items.expected_output: Create scheduled meeting (type=2) with start_time set to tomorrow 2pm.
items.context: User wants to schedule a meeting

items.expected_output: Create instant meeting (type=1) that starts immediately.
List user's scheduled meetings.
Get meeting information by meeting ID.

items.input: create meeting called 'Team Standup' with password and waiting room enabled
items.expected_output: Create meeting with topic 'Team Standup', password set, and waiting_room=true.
1. List meetings. 2. Find relevant meeting. 3. Update meeting start_time to 4pm.
items.context: User wants to reschedule without specifying which meeting

items.input: get the invite text for meeting about quarterly review
items.expected_output: 1. List meetings. 2. Find meeting about quarterly review. 3. Get meeting invitation text.

items.input: who attended the last team meeting
items.expected_output: 1. List meetings/past meetings. 2. Find team meeting. 3. Get past meeting participants.
List all cloud recordings for user.

items.input: get recording for the budget meeting
items.expected_output: 1. List recordings. 2. Find recording for budget meeting. 3. Get recording details/download link.
1. List recordings. 2. Find recording from last week. 3. Request confirmation. 4. Delete recording.
items.context: User wants to delete recording - needs consent

items.input: create a webinar about product launch
items.expected_output: Create webinar with topic about product launch.
List user's scheduled webinars.
Add meeting registrant with email john@example.com to meeting.
1. List meetings. 2. Find meeting scheduled for tomorrow. 3. Request confirmation. 4. Delete meeting.
items.context: User wants to cancel meeting - needs consent

items.input: create recurring weekly meeting every monday at 10am
items.expected_output: Create recurring meeting (type=3) with recurrence settings for weekly on Monday.
1. Recognize 'zom' as typo for 'zoom'. 2. List user's Zoom Rooms devices.

items.input: what's my daily usage for this month
items.expected_output: Get daily usage report for current month.
Get webinar details by webinar ID.
1. List recent meetings. 2. Get meeting summary for most recent or specified meeting.

items.input: add webinar registrant sarah@company.com to upcoming webinar
items.expected_output: 1. List webinars. 2. Find upcoming webinar. 3. Add registrant.
items.context: User wants to register for webinar

items.expected_output: Create meeting with duration=60 minutes.

items.input: who were the participants in webinar about training
items.expected_output: 1. List webinars. 2. Find training webinar. 3. Get webinar participants.

items.input: schedule meeting for client demo next tuesday
items.expected_output: Create scheduled meeting with topic 'client demo' for next Tuesday.
items.context: User wants to schedule with natural language date

items.expected_output: List archived meeting files.
items.context: User wants to see archived content
